page.title: 08PEOPLE IN INCE BLUNDELL
page.content:
We made a survey of all the households in the village . We found that the people of Ince Blundell form a very close-knit community. They like having familiar faces around them but resent the inevitable gossip and lack of privacy.
Our survey revealed a quiet way of life with home-based activities, such as gardening. reading and craftwork, being the most popular pastimes.
People liked the quiet life and lovely views but one common complaint was the lack of a shop or post-office and the lack of mains gas supply.
Almost all the people surveyed lived in the village by choice and many families have lived here for generations.
